markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Quick Juggler](/Feats.aspx?ID=1189) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 74

**Archetype** [Juggler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=36)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12); [Juggler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1187)

</column>

---

When you start to [Juggle](/Feats.aspx?ID=1199) or add another item to those you are Juggling, you add two items instead of one. Increase the maximum number of items you can Juggle by one.
name: Quick Juggler
primary_source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 74
